sen.j: 九条駅（くじょうえき）は、京都府京都市南区 (京都市)東九条南烏丸町にある、京都市営地下鉄京都市営地下鉄烏丸線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Higashi Kujo Minami Karasuma-cho of Minami Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Kujo Station is a stop on the Karasuma Line, a Kyoto Municipal Subway Line.
Located in Higashi Kujo Minami Karasuma-cho of Minami Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Kujo Station is a stop on the Karasuma Line, a Kyoto Municipal Subway Line.
Kujo Station, located in Higashi-Kujo, Minami Karasuma-cho of Minami Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Karasuma Line of the Kyoto Municipal Subway.

sen.j: 駅番号はK12。
sen.e: The number of this station is K12.
The number of this station is K12.
The number of this station is K12.

sen.j: 1日平均乗降客数は 4,107人（2005年度）で、京都市交通局の全駅で最も少ない。
sen.e: Passenger getting off and off at this station averaged 4,107 per day (fiscal 2005,) the least of all stations under the jurisdiction of Kyoto Municipal Traffic Bureau.
Passenger getting off and off at this station averaged 4,107 per day (fiscal 2005,) the least of all stations under the jurisdiction of Kyoto Municipal Traffic Bureau.
Passenger getting on and off at this station averaged 4,107 per day (fiscal year 2005,) the least of all stations under the jurisdiction of the Kyoto Municipal Transportation Bureau.

sen.j: もともと、京都～竹田間は近鉄京都線と並行し、乗客が少ない（九条、十条、くいな橋が、乗降客数のワースト3駅である）うえ、京都駅の徒歩圏内にあることも影響していると考えられる。
sen.e: The section between Kyoto and Takeda ran parallel with Kintetsu Kyoto Line from the very outset and in addition to the number of passengers being small (Kujo, Jujo and Kuinabashi Stations are the three worst as far as number of passengers are concerned,) the fact that the station is within walking distance of Kyoto Station is considered to be influencing the consequences.

The section between Kyoto and Takeda ran parallel with Kintetsu Kyoto Line from the very outset and in addition to the number of passengers being small (Kujo, Jujo and Kuinabashi Stations are the three worst as far as number of passengers are concerned,) the fact that the station is within walking distance of Kyoto Station is considered to be influencing the consequences.

The section between Kyoto and Takeda ran parallel with Kintetsu Kyoto Line from the very outset and in addition to the number of passengers being small (Kujo, Jujo and Kuinabashi Stations are the three worst as far as number of passengers are concerned,) the fact that the station is within walking distance of Kyoto Station is considered to be influencing the consequences.

sen.j: 九条烏丸交差点の地下に位置する、プラットホーム1面2線の地下駅である。
sen.e: The station is situated underground of the Kujo-Karasuma crossing and has one platform with tracks on both sides.
The station is situated underground of the Kujo-Karasuma crossing and has one platform with tracks on both sides.
The station is situated underground of the Kujo-Karasuma crossing and has one platform with tracks on both sides.

sen.j: 改札口は1ヶ所のみ。
sen.e: Ticket gates are installed at only one place.
Ticket gates are installed at only one place.
Ticket gates are installed at only one place.

sen.j: 1988年6月11日 烏丸線京都～竹田間開通時に開業。
sen.e: Opened on June 11, 1988 coincidental with Karasuma Line commencing operations of section between Kyoto and Takeda Stations.
It opened on June 11, 1988 concurrently with Karasuma Line, commencing the operation of the section between the Kyoto and Takeda stations.
June 11, 1988: The station opened concurrently with Karasuma Line, commencing the operation of the section between the Kyoto and Takeda stations.

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年）4月1日 PiTaPa使用開始。
sen.e: PiTaPa Card became usable on April 1, 2007.
